verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hear <S%H6030><s%> you in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble; <S%H6869><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> defend <S%H7682><s%> you;
Send <S%H7971><s%> you help <S%H5828><s%> from the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and strengthen <S%H5582><s%> you out of Zion; <S%H6726><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your offerings, <S%H4503><s%> and accept <S%H1878><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> sacrifice; Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Grant <S%H5414><s%> you according to your own heart, <S%H3824><s%> and fulfill <S%H4390><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your counsel. <S%H6098><s%>

We will rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in your salvation, <S%H3444><s%> and in the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> we will set up our banners: <S%H1713><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> fulfill <S%H4390><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your petitions. <S%H4862><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> I that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saves <S%H3467><s%> his anointed; <S%H4899><s%> he will hear <S%H6030><s%> him from his holy <S%H6944><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> with the saving <S%H3468><s%> strength <S%H1369><s%> of his right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3225><s%>

Some <S%H428><s%> trust in chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and some <S%H428><s%> in horses: <S%H5483><s%> but we will remember <S%H2142><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>
They are brought <S%H3766><s%> down <S%H3766><s%> and fallen: <S%H5307><s%> but we are risen, <S%H6965><s%> and stand <S%H5749><s%> upright.
Save, <S%H3467><s%> LORD: <S%H3068><s%> let the king <S%H4428><s%> hear <S%H6030><s%> us when we call. <S%H7121><s%>
